node.title: Daniel Avery, Alessandro Cortini - Illusion of Time
node.description: yet another dreamy and atmospheric new album. Daniel Avery and Alessandro Cortini (Nine Inch Nails) joined forces and remotely made an album full of distorted drones, warm synth pads, feedback loops and other weird noises.
node.release: Illusion of Time was released through Phantasy Sounds on March 27, 2020.
